summary: Comprehensive testing of 4 GuessIt improvements: Live Matches section, performance optimization with caching, mobile Grid/List toggle hiding, and My Predictions functionality. All major improvements verified successfully.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Predefined test user not found (expected for fresh deployment)

passed_tests: Backend APIs working correctly (94.4% success rate from backend_test.py)
Desktop: Live Matches section appears ABOVE 'All Matches' with animated red dot and count (2)
Desktop: Live match cards have proper styling with 'live-match-card' class and red glow
Desktop: Grid/List toggle visible and functional on homepage (grid/list view switching works)
Desktop: Grid/List toggle visible and functional on My Predictions page
Mobile (375px): Grid/List toggle properly hidden on homepage with 'hidden md:flex' classes
Mobile: Match cards display optimally in grid view mode (113 cards found)
Navigation caching performance: My Predictions to homepage in 48ms, no loading spinners
Authentication flow works with test_view@test.com / TestPass123! credentials
My Predictions page accessible at /my-predictions route
My Predictions summary cards working: Total (4), Correct (0), Wrong (0), Pending (4), Points (0)
Live matches showing real-time scores: Copa Libertadores matches 1-0 and 0-0
WebSocket connection status indicators working (Live updates active vs Auto-refreshing)
Football API endpoints returning match data correctly
Prediction caching working - instant page loads on navigation return
